title: 이달의소녀탐구 #364 (LOONA TV #364)
summary:
0:01 -- One minute before the fan meet begins, everyone: "fighting~!"
0:10 -- OEC starts their performance. The others are listening to the fans cheer through the in ear. They all get emotional and HeeJin starts crying. GoWon and Olivia: "Hey Jeon HeeJin, don't cry." YeoJin tries to console her.
0:36 -- Chuu enters and is crying as well. YeoJin calms her down too. Chuu and YeoJin hug.
0:46 -- OEC is performiing without knowing the situation backstage.
